text_logic_form: The length of the line $ZY$ is $2x + 3$ units.
The length of the line $WX$ is $x + 4$ units.
Find the length of the line $WX$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The length of the line $ZY$ is $2x + 3$ units.
The length of the line $WX$ is $x + 4$ units.
Find the length of the line $WX$.
diagram_logic_form: Point $P$ lies on the line connecting $X$ and $Z$.
Point $P$ also lies on the line connecting $W$ and $Y$.
The line connecting $W$ and $Z$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $X$ and $W$.
line_instances: There are lines $WP$, $WY$, $WZ$, $XP$, $XW$, $XY$, $XZ$, $YP$, $YZ$, $ZP$, forming the rectangle $WXYZ$.
